TopicTitle: A second chance for changing names

Articles.Content: I've changed my name before, but I'm not satisfied Now and I want to change again.  So, I think I should discuss it with the mods. If you can solve this problem, I'd like to thank you. If you can't, just tell me the reasons. And sorry for my bad English.

54 minutes ago, Abel Military Services said:

I've changed my name before, but I'm not satisfied Now and I want to change again.  So, I think I should discuss it with the mods. If you can solve this problem, I'd like to thank you. If you can't, just tell me the reasons. And sorry for my bad English. 

 

forum rules allow for a single name change.  You have to contact the moderators

We don’t allow for multiple name changes.   People  can abuse the system.    In the thread that you requested the name change you were made aware of this, and advised to think long and hard about it to make sure it was what you really wanted. 
 

I’m sorry, but we cannot offer exceptions to the rule.  If we give you an exception, then we have to give it to everyone, and that defeats the purpose of the rule.
